channel.title: CVE Feed for Hancom -- Hangul Word Processor in Thinkfree Office NEO Trial Word
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hancom -- Hangul Word Processor in Thinkfree Office NEO Trial Word

item.title: CVE-2017-2819|2024-08-05T14:02:07.711Z -- hancom -- hangul%20word%20processor%20in%20thinkfree%20office%20neo%20trial%20word
item.description: An exploitable heap-based buffer overflow exists in the Hangul Word Processor component (version 9.6.1.4350) of Hancom Thinkfree Office NEO 9.6.1.4902. A specially crafted document stream can cause an integer underflow resulting in a buffer overflow which can lead to code execution under the context of the application. An attacker can entice a user to open up a document in order to trigger this vulnerability.
